summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding a draft detention memo related to the Epstein case. The email indicates the memo is a draft subject to further edits from the legal team.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email who is forwarding a draft detention memo and mentions incorporating edits from the team.

connections.description: Colleagues or legal team members collaborating on a detention memo draft, as indicated by the email forwarding the document and requesting edits.

events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a draft detention memo via email, indicating ongoing legal preparations or proceedings related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 30, 2020, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email attaches a draft detention memo, indicating active legal work on the Epstein case at that time.
The sender mentions that more edits from the team are expected, showing collaborative legal preparation.
The correspondence originates from the official address 'One Saint Andrew's Plaza', confirming its prosecutorial origin.
